text: Wee Willie Winkie is a 1937 American adventure drama movie directed by John Ford and was based on the story by Rudyard Kipling. It stars Shirley Temple, Victor McLaglen, C. Aubrey Smith, Cesar Romero, June Lang, Brandon Hurst, Lionel Pape, Cyril McLaglen and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1938. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1937 drama movies Category:1930s family movies Category:1930s American adventure movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Movies set in India
title: Wee Willie Winkie (movie)
